key_commands.description: List all pods in the namespace to get component and pod names for further inspection.
Check frontend (nginx-thrift) logs; reveals connection refused errors on port 8080.

key_commands.command: exec_shell("kubectl get pods -n test-social-network -o name | xargs -I{} sh -c 'echo === {}; kubectl logs -n test-social-network {} --tail=200 2>&1 | grep -i -E \"error|exception|fail|panic|fatal\" | head -n 10'")
